sushi.name: California Roll
sushi.description: A classic roll filled with avocado, crab meat, and cucumber

sushi.name: Spicy Tuna Roll
sushi.description: A spicy roll filled with tuna and scallions, topped with sriracha mayo

sushi.name: Dragon Roll
sushi.description: A popular roll filled with shrimp tempura and topped with avocado and eel sauce

sashimi.name: Tuna Sashimi
sashimi.description: Thin slices of raw tuna, served with soy sauce and wasabi

sashimi.description: Thin slices of raw salmon, served with soy sauce and wasabi

sashimi.name: Yellowtail Sashimi
sashimi.description: Thin slices of raw yellowtail, served with soy sauce and wasabi

nigiri.description: A ball of rice topped with raw salmon, served with soy sauce and wasabi

nigiri.name: Eel Nigiri
